mapper.select: select count(*) from port_lag where siteId = #{0}
mapper.update: update port_lag set lagstatus = #{1} where siteId = #{0}
mapper.select: SELECT p.portId, l.id as lagId, l.buffer as master, l.floodBate as backup FROM `port_inst` p INNER JOIN port_lag l ON p.siteId = l.siteId AND p.lagId = l.id;
